analysis.description:
ERC721Basic (/unique_chucks/18/0xa72bb2b7440f096dae27e2ffc8ee24d356de0ac4.sol#44-208) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/18/0xa72bb2b7440f096dae27e2ffc8ee24d356de0ac4.sol#128-129)
	-approve (/unique_chucks/18/0xa72bb2b7440f096dae27e2ffc8ee24d356de0ac4.sol#138-140)

SaleAuction.bid (/unique_chucks/18/0xa72bb2b7440f096dae27e2ffc8ee24d356de0ac4.sol#741-763) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- seller == address(nonFungibleContract) || seller == owner
	- seller == address(nonFungibleContract) || seller == owner

Reentrancy in SaleAuction.bid (/unique_chucks/18/0xa72bb2b7440f096dae27e2ffc8ee24d356de0ac4.sol#741-763):
	External calls:
	- _transfer(msg.sender,_tokenId) (/unique_chucks/18/0xa72bb2b7440f096dae27e2ffc8ee24d356de0ac4.sol#745-747)
	External calls sending eth:
	- price = _bid(_tokenId,msg.value) (/unique_chucks/18/0xa72bb2b7440f096dae27e2ffc8ee24d356de0ac4.sol#744)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- gen0SaleCount (/unique_chucks/18/0xa72bb2b7440f096dae27e2ffc8ee24d356de0ac4.sol)
	- lastGen0SalePrices (/unique_chucks/18/0xa72bb2b7440f096dae27e2ffc8ee24d356de0ac4.sol)
	- lastGen0SalePrices (/unique_chucks/18/0xa72bb2b7440f096dae27e2ffc8ee24d356de0ac4.sol)

Reentrancy in Auction.createAuction (/unique_chucks/18/0xa72bb2b7440f096dae27e2ffc8ee24d356de0ac4.sol#572-588):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(_owns(msg.sender,_tokenId)) (/unique_chucks/18/0xa72bb2b7440f096dae27e2ffc8ee24d356de0ac4.sol#580-581)
	- _escrow(msg.sender,_tokenId) (/unique_chucks/18/0xa72bb2b7440f096dae27e2ffc8ee24d356de0ac4.sol#581-584)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokenIdToAuction (/unique_chucks/18/0xa72bb2b7440f096dae27e2ffc8ee24d356de0ac4.sol#587)

Reentrancy in SaleAuction.createAuction (/unique_chucks/18/0xa72bb2b7440f096dae27e2ffc8ee24d356de0ac4.sol#733-740):
	External calls:
	- _escrow(_seller,_tokenId) (/unique_chucks/18/0xa72bb2b7440f096dae27e2ffc8ee24d356de0ac4.sol#737)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokenIdToAuction (/unique_chucks/18/0xa72bb2b7440f096dae27e2ffc8ee24d356de0ac4.sol#740)
SaleAuction.isSaleAuction should be constant (/unique_chucks/18/0xa72bb2b7440f096dae27e2ffc8ee24d356de0ac4.sol#697)
